original_text: all that the Lord has commanded you by Moses, from the day that the Lord gave commandment, and onward throughout your generations,
korean_text: 곧 여호와께서 모세를 통하여 너희에게 명령한 모든 것을 여호와께서 명령한 날 이후부터 너희 대대에 지키지 못하여

sentences.original_text: all that the Lord has commanded you by Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 모세를 통해 너희에게 명령하신 모든 것

sentences.original_text: from the day that the Lord gave commandment
